title: What are the things wrong with homophobia? - Quora

response.answer_text: Now, allow me to list out 20 things wrong with homophobia: Disrespectful. You should respect other people’s choices. Like, you respect cat lovers, why can’t you respect same sex lovers?Unacceptance. Everyone is different. We accept people of all races, why can’t we respect people of all sexual orientations?Unwilling to change. Well, voting used to be men’s rights, but now everyone can vote. Things change. Marriage is no longer between a man and a women.Banning human rights. It is our right to get married just like you have your rights to vote for Donald Trump.It has nothing to do with you if you don’t care. Just because gay people get married doesn’t mean you have to get gay marriage too.Legalizing gay marriage does not mean that gays don’t respect heterosexual marriage. Why can some people get married and some can’t? It isn’t logical.Mutual respect. We’re not heterophobic. We accept and love heterosexual people too. Yet some of them are still homophobic.Homosexuals aren’t interested in making other people gay, but homophobes are.People are born gay, but taught homophobia.We’re not the minority. However, only 1 species, otherwise known as humans, are homophobic.It is important for animals to be homosexual as they take care of the offsprings of heterosexual couples who have died.People all around the world are being bullied, abused, because of their homosexuality. You are hurting people. Stop.Homosexual people have a higher depression and attempted suicide rate which leads to self destruction. In 10+ countries in the world, you get the death penalty for being homosexual.There, all from the brain of a 13 year old. It took me less than 20 minutes to write that. -Your Unicorn Friend

Everything is wrong with homophobia. It’s discrimination on a person merely for their sexual orientation, which they have absolutely zero power over of unlike homophobes. A homophobic person makes the choice to disregard a human just because they feel like the way they are is superior. When they do this they make the choice to disregard who that person is, oppress this person, are hateful, disrespectful, dictate another person and worst of all become a bigot. A person is not based on that of their body, but the content of their character/soul(religious/non religious whatever makes you feel good). I don’t care if someone is white, black, Hispanic, Colombian, Haitian, Japanese, what you look like, your nationality, what disabilities you have, rich/poor, male/female, old/young, popular/not popular, what language you speak, religious/non religious what you sexuality is, you gender expression/gender identity
